sections.hero.title: Manchester United Wage Bill Analysis Season 24/25 to 25/26
sections.hero.intro: This dashboard synthesises Manchester United's wage bill evolution and restructuring following the 2024 operational governance shift. It integrates exits, arrivals and weekly mass impact, illustrating the transition from an inflated peak toward a more sustainable model without sacrificing competitive intent. Each visual reinforces three core questions: How much is released?, Where is it reassigned? and How efficient is the new structure?
sections.hero.filterHint: Tip: start in Total mode for macro context, then toggle each campaign to inspect sequencing and depth.
